They conduct regular review and update of internal instructions, procedures, policies, etc. Any documents, which his to be published at PAL, has to undergo QMS team's review.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"SPI team also performs internal audits regularly on projects (basic, normal, technical and other). The output is always a formal Internal Audit Report.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
